articles.title: 150-foot asteroid to pass Earth by a narrow margin today, says NASA; Check details - HT Tech
articles.description: Yet another asteroid has been observed by NASA and it is expected to pass Earth today, March 27, by a narrow margin. From speed and size to distance of approach, check all the details.
articles.content: Earth has been impacted by multiple celestial phenomena in the last few weeks. Along with the vernal equinox, the peak of the solar cycle 25 is approaching which has led to increased solar activity. … [+2061 chars]

articles.title: IIT Madras Graduate Pavan Davuluri To Head Microsoft Windows - NDTV
articles.description: Pavan Davuluri, an IIT Madras alumni, was appointed the new head of Microsoft Windows and Surface, making him the latest Indian to take on a leadership role at a Big Tech company much like Google's Sundar Pichai and Microsoft's Satya Nadella.
